topple.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to become unsteady and then fall over, or to make something do this
topple.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: A stack of plates swayed, and began to topple over.
topple.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to take power away from a leader or government, especially by force
topple.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: This scandal could topple the government.
